tasks.task: Attend and facilitate a farmer field school training.
subtasks: Register for the week-long comprehensive farmer field school facilitator training.
Engage with extension officers from the Caribbean region.
Familiarize with the updated Farmer Field School Manual.
Learn strategies for planning and community engagement.
Understand the purpose and potential impact of farmer field schools.
Acquire skills for responsible pesticide use.
Deliver effective farmer field school programs post-training.

tasks.task: Support the reduction of highly hazardous pesticides.
subtasks: Participate in delivering farmer field schools focusing on pesticide reduction.
Adopt agroecological systems in farming practices.
Contribute to food security and environmental sustainability.
Provide information on the training organizers and participants.
Highlight the importance of sustainable agriculture.
Acknowledge the support from FAO and ACP MEAs 3 project.
